restlib.server

Interface Resource

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BioConnegResource<T>, BioResource<T>, ConnegResource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BioConnegResourceDecorator, BioResourceDecorator, BioResourceWrapper, ConnegResourceDecorator, ResourceWrapper, UniformResource

    public interface Resource
    An HTTP resource that can handle and respond to HTTP requests. Implementations must be threadsafe.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ListenableFuture<Response> acceptMessage(Request request, Object message)
      Handle the client request and message entity and return a response.
      ListenableFuture<Response> handle(Request request)
      Handle the incoming request and return a response.
      Route route()
      Returns the Route that this Resource matches.

    • Method Detail

      • acceptMessage

        ListenableFuture<Response> acceptMessage(Request request,
                                       Object message)
        Handle the client request and message entity and return a response. This method is called by a connector when a client HTTP request includes a message entity and handle() provides an HTTP 100 Continue response.
        Parameters:
        request - The client HTTP request.
        message - The client HTTP message body.
        Returns:
        The server's response to the client request.

      • handle

        ListenableFuture<Response> handle(Request request)
        Handle the incoming request and return a response. Note: HTTP methods that require the entity body of the request, should return a response with the 100 Continue status. Connectors will process this response and call acceptMessage when the message is available.
        Parameters:
        request - The client HTTP request.
        Returns:
        The server's response to the client request.

      • route

        Route route()
        Returns the Route that this Resource matches.
        Returns:
        This Resource's Route.
